criticism: The transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control, which can lead to loss of funds.
The transfer function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control, which can lead to loss of funds.
The mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, which can lead to integer overflow and potentially cause the contract to become unusable or lose funds.
The buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of the 'amount' variable, which can lead to integer overflow and potentially cause the contract to become unusable or lose funds.
The sell function allows a potential trap due to overflow of the 'amount' variable, which can lead to integer overflow and potentially cause the contract to become unusable or lose funds.
